title: Episode 503 - Drain The Creek!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway formally announce their bids for the New Hanover County Board Of Education in 2020, we discuss Vet TV's Donnie O'Malley's latest movie "A Grunt's Life", why newspapers are starting to become non-profit organizations, Ross ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway formally announce their bids for the New Hanover County Board Of Education in 2020, we discuss Vet TV's Donnie O'Malley's latest movie "A Grunt's Life", why newspapers are starting to become non-profit organizations, Ross wants to open up a day care center called "The Karens", Dan reads reviews of people who hate him live on air, why Ross' WWII Grandfather wouldn't entertain penis jokes.

description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway formally announce their bids for the New Hanover County Board Of Education in 2020, we discuss Vet TV's Donnie O'Malley's latest movie "A Grunt's Life", why newspapers are starting to become non-profit organizations, Ross wants to open up a day care center called "The Karens", Dan reads reviews of people who hate him live on air, why Ross' WWII Grandfather wouldn't entertain penis jokes.
